title: Where can I find CrackMes for beginners? [closed]
content:
Closed. This question needs to be more focused. It is not currently accepting answers.

I'm interested in learning. Where can I find CrackMes for beginners? Especially ones with answers.

comments.text: sorry, this kind of questions is not a good fit for this site.

this seems like a perfectly reasonable question to me [and perfect for this forum], @IgorSkochinsky?
